title: What Does the Wind Move?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 45 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 150L
description: Have you ever let go of a balloon and watched it blow away in the wind? What Does the Wind Move? introduces readers to some things the wind moves and the different ways it can move things. Detailed photographs and a repetitive text structure support early, emergent readers. This book can be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as determine cause-and-effect relationships.
meta: floats, lifts, pushes, something, turns, wind
